name: Pick A Trash
description:
Game Overview

     It's a game that will allow us to take on the role of a driver. And we have to keep driving along the way We have to keep collecting different types of garbage. According to the level of those levels and what matters most the game is not focused on speed. But we have to keep collecting the trash that appears in this city. there will be obstacles along the way which we cannot avoid but must continue to reach the destination and to control the car Left button is used to brake or reverse. The button on the right to go forward. When you find trash, you have to poke it at the garbage, and the car will automatically collect the trash.

Game Play

     When you finish the level The player will go to the factory page. to take out the garbage collected from the checkpoint Let's separate them into the trash bin for each color correctly. Recycling involves putting one or two items together and getting a new product. in order to sell them to outside shops to earn extra money.
